name: .HE1 File Extension
summary: Learn about .HE1 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Game archive used by Humongous Entertainment games, such as Backyard Baseball and the Spy Fox game series; contains graphics that make up the environments that appear in the game.

content: HE1 archives are used by classic adventure games, such as Putt-Putt, Pajama Sam, Fatty Bear, and Freddi Fish, developed by Humongous Entertainment. The HE1 archive is also used by ScummVM, a virtual machine that lets you play the previously mentioned games, as long as you have the appropriate game resource files.
NOTE: The HE1 resource archive is located in the game directory.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
